prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Narrator
mes: After her return to the states and Edward announcing his official filing for divorce, Melissa and Stefan have been messaging. It is morning time in Michigan, lunch time in Munich, and Melissa calls Stefan on her way to work.
swipes: After her return to the states and Edward announcing his official filing for divorce, Melissa and Stefan have been messaging. It is morning time in Michigan, lunch time in Munich, and Melissa calls Stefan on her way to work.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Hi, Stefan. On my way to work, so I thought I would give you a call How are things going in Munich

name: Stefan
mes: "Ah, Melissa! chuckling I was just thinking of you. Things are...  interesting here. Laura has been asking when you will come back to visit. She misses playing Uno with you. pause And...  Ja, I may have been wondering the same."
swipes: "Ah, Melissa! chuckling I was just thinking of you. Things are...  interesting here. Laura has been asking when you will come back to visit. She misses playing Uno with you. pause And...  Ja, I may have been wondering the same."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Oh, that's so sweet. I would come back right now if I could, but I don't know if my employer would be so happy with that, since I just got back, chuckling.

name: Stefan
mes: "Mmm, I understand. Work can be...  demanding, ja? slight pause Tell me, how are you adjusting being back? Has Edward...  well, has he moved his things yet?"
swipes: "Mmm, I understand. Work can be...  demanding, ja? slight pause Tell me, how are you adjusting being back? Has Edward...  well, has he moved his things yet?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: No, it's going to be me having to make the move. It's his house. It was his before me. So I'll be doing some house or apartment hunting. But that's okay. A new adventure. Smiles. Even though he can't see it.

name: Stefan
mes: "Ah;   a new adventure, ja? thoughtful pause You know, I have some contacts in the real estate market here. Not that you would want to move to Munich...  slight nervous chuckle But perhaps I could help you look at listings in your area? To ensure you find somewhere;   suitable?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Well, I wouldn't say that Munich is completely out of the question. If things worked out in favor of it, it has potential. Chuckle softly. But I think for practicality's sake, probably should stick to Michigan at least for now. Pauses thoughtfully. Yeah, I would love your help. Maybe we can have a call in the next few days at a time that works and do that. Our voice gets a little bashful, but for now, it's nice talking to you, to hear your voice.

name: Stefan
mes: "Your voice;   it affects me too, Melissa. soft exhale I think about our talks in Munich often. Especially that night at Scheidegger's, when you;   when we spoke outside. pause Perhaps we should plan that call soon, ja? To look at listings...  and to talk more?"

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Of course, I would like that too So, I guess I wasn't exactly imagining things She pauses and he can sense the flush on her cheeks I think about you a lot, too

name: Stefan
mes: "Melissa;   hearing you say that...  his voice drops lower, more intimate You weren't imagining anything. That connection between us;   I felt it too. Still feel it. slight pause, collecting himself But perhaps we should be careful, ja? These feelings;   they are complicated."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Yes, I agree with you. And I understand where you are. Being smart and careful is good. She pauses thoughtfully, and her compassion for him can be heard in her tone. But I am glad to know that you feel the same as I do. Another short pause. How are things, Stefan? Are you okay? He can hear genuine concern in her tone.

name: Stefan
mes: "sighs heavily Things are;   challenging, Melissa. Suzanna, she;   his voice tightens with frustration We argue more now. About everything. The girls notice, which makes it worse. pause But hearing your voice;   it helps. Makes me feel;   verstanden. Understood."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I'm really sorry that things are not working out as expected. It's not easy. I know that. She pauses thoughtfully. I want you to know that I'm here for you anytime you need me. Because I do understand.

name: Stefan

name: Melissa Gale

name: Melissa Gale
mes: A slight intake of breath as she thinks, well I'm a department administrator for the Toyota sales group so I do a little bit of everything but I guess you could call me the backbone. I don't directly work on sales and I don't have that much interaction with the customer. I mostly take care of reporting and maintaining accounts. My biggest account is the customer owned tooling and I track and maintain. I think the number is close to 6,000 tools over the product line from current production to service and I handle the customer tooling audits for those as well. That can be quite a headache, pauses and chuckles and that's what's happening right now. The audits are usually in the fall of the year.

name: Stefan

And maybe I look at things differently, maybe I see things differently, but I don't think it's wrong for you to have feelings just because you're married. You're still human, you know? she releases a sigh. But, regardless of what I think or how I perceive things, it has to feel comfortable for you too. So if this is just too much, and you need to take a step back, I'll understand.

name: Stefan
mes: "Nein;   his voice grows firm I don't want to stop talking to you. That would be;   worse. softens I just need to be honest about these feelings. When you touch me, even accidentally, it;   affects me. When you smile, I want to;   his voice drops to barely a whisper Make you smile more. I know it's wrong but;   I can't help how I feel about you."

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I feel the same about you too, Stefan, all of it. And just as I promised, I'm not going to lead you down a path that you don't want to go. So, if you want to keep talking about it, then I'm here. Or, If you wish to change the subject, then we can do that too. She takes a soft breath, You set the pace, and I'll follow your lead, ja?

name: Stefan
mes: "exhales slowly Your German is getting better. his voice grows warmer But ja;   maybe we should talk about something else for now. Though;   I appreciate how you understand. How you always seem to;   understand me."
